extension.name: plg_content_joomoofixedrating
extension.author: Tom Hartung
extension.copyright: Copyright (C) 2009 - 2012 Tom Hartung. All rights reserved.
extension.description: Plugin to display a fixed, constant, predetermined rating of joomla content articles and joomoo gallery images

field.name: rating_label
field.label: Default Label for Rating
field.description: Default description of rating. Overridable in placeholder.

field.name: rating_subtitle
field.label: Default Rating Subtitle
field.description: Text to appear beneath rating bars eg. to explain that they are disabled and maybe why.

field.name: rating_value
field.label: Rating Value
field.description: Constant rating value for all articles and gallery images using this plugin

field.name: rating_bar_color
field.label: Bar Color
field.description: Color of rating bars. Idea: choose black or white because these are not active

field.name: rating_bar_background
field.label: Bar Background
field.description: Color - or lack thereof - used for background of rating bars
